snippet: The oilfield services company attributed the decline to a shortage of guar beans from India, which are used in hydraulic fracturing fluids by drillers.
lead_paragraph: The oilfield services company attributed the decline to a shortage of guar beans from India, which are used in hydraulic fracturing fluids by drillers.

headline.main: Halliburton Warns of Lower Profit Margins
headline.print_headline: Halliburton Warns of Lower Profit Margins
